New Records: Jordan Poole scored 30 points, marking his fifth straight game with over 25 points.
The Washington Wizards achieved their largest win of the season.
Key Match Events: The Wizards extended a 20-point lead with a 7-0 run early in the fourth quarter.
Rookie Kyshawn George contributed with a key steal and dunk.
Post-Match Reflections: The Wizards have been playing competitive basketball, especially at home.
The Bulls struggled with 20 turnovers and a poor 3-point shooting performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls finished 29.8% from 3-point range, well below their average.
The Wizards are still last in the Eastern Conference but have shown improvement.
